title: Administrate in bulk in Power BI Service
excerpt: Have you ever wonder how to give access to multiple workspaces at once, or how to restore a deleted workspace? Here is a quick and easy way to do that :)  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center  SUBSCRIBE to learn more about Power and Excel BI! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJ7UhloHSA4wAqPzyi6TOkw?sub_confirmation=1
